AnomalyDetection_JournalEntries.name: Financial Anomaly Detection System
AnomalyDetection_JournalEntries.description: Developed a machine learning-based anomaly detection system for journal entries using isolation forests and statistical analysis. Implemented automated flagging of unusual transactions with 95% accuracy.

Extract-Text-from-JPEG.name: Document Text Extraction Tool
Extract-Text-from-JPEG.description: Built a Python application using regular expressions and OCR techniques to extract text from JPEG images. Handles bill of entry PDF files and converts them to structured data.

LinearRegression-Ridge-Lasso.name: Regression Analysis Framework
LinearRegression-Ridge-Lasso.description: Implemented and compared multiple regression techniques including Linear Regression, Ridge, and Lasso regularization. Developed comprehensive analysis framework for model selection and hyperparameter tuning.

Random-Forest-Classifier.name: Income Qualification ML Model
Random-Forest-Classifier.description: Project 2 on Machine Learning: Income Qualification. Built a Random Forest classifier to predict income qualification with feature engineering, cross-validation, and model optimization. Achieved high accuracy through ensemble learning techniques.

XGBoost.name: Mercedes-Benz Manufacturing Optimization
XGBoost.description: Project 1 on Machine Learning: Mercedes-Benz Greener Manufacturing. Developed an XGBoost model to optimize manufacturing processes and reduce testing time. Implemented feature selection and hyperparameter optimization.

EmployeeAttrition.name: Employee Attrition Prediction System
EmployeeAttrition.description: Machine Learning project applying MinMaxScalar on selected columns with Label Encoding & One Hot Encoding. Built predictive models to identify factors contributing to employee attrition. Implemented comprehensive data preprocessing pipeline.

Working-with-PDF-Files.name: Working With PDF Files
Working-with-PDF-Files.description: Reading Bill of entry PDF files using regex Python
